page.title: 18SCOUTS BROWNIES AND GUIDES
page.content: Four of the girls and boys in our school go to {Scouts, Brownies}and {Guides.}We like this because you learn things about first-aid and get to try out ideas on rubber models. You can work for badges. I am working for my{Hostess Badge}just now. We have to be able to cook and serve meals to get this badge. We also play games like Fairies, Witches and{Port and {Starboard.} In summer we go camping at weekends, Last time we went to Fort William.Sometimes we go hunting for birds nests and if we find any we go back every four weeks and take photos of the birds' progress. We also have sports in summertime.
